attributes.action: lead by example and give up his pension rights for the period he mismanaged the economy during his time as Chancellor of the Exchequer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Prime Minister thinks that Sir Fred Goodwin ought to give up his pension rights for mismanaging RBS then the Prime Minister ought to give up the more generous pension scheme he accrued pension rights in whilst he mismanaged our nations economy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
